itunes:title: Celebrating International Women's Day w/Our Favorite Female Authors, Their Books + More
title: Celebrating International Women's Day w/Our Favorite Female Authors, Their Books + More
description:
In Episode 41 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share many of their favorite female authors + audiobook narrators. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about the differences in the reading lives of women and men.Â 

**If you enjoy our podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes all for just $5 a month!

*The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!

Loving Lately
3:38 The Thursday Murder Club | Richard Osman
4:15 MicrofiberÂ (T)
6:04 The TackleboxÂ  (R)

Latest Reads

13:16 Annotated Podcast
